<title level="1" pfs="">[Ekundayo (Level 6)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2391)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 32

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Ekundayo (Level 6)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2391)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 22

**Perception** +12; (expert) 

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +11, [Giant Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +9, [Guild Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +9, [Hunting Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +11, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** +1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[lesser acid flask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=74) (3), [lesser alchemist's fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75) (3), [bag of holding type I](/Equipment.aspx?ID=249), [Bedroll](/Equipment.aspx?ID=7), [Boots of Elvenkind](/Equipment.aspx?ID=413), [Coyote Cloak](/Equipment.aspx?ID=426), [Explorer's Clothing](/Armor.aspx?ID=2), [Compass](/Equipment.aspx?ID=16), [Flint and Steel](/Equipment.aspx?ID=21), [lesser healing potions](/Equipment.aspx?ID=186) (3), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), _[+1 striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=380) [composite longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74) (20 arrows)_, _+1 [longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31)_, [Rations](/Equipment.aspx?ID=40) (1 week), [Rope](/Equipment.aspx?ID=44) (50 feet), [torches](/Equipment.aspx?ID=60) (3), [Waterskin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=62), [woodworker's artisan tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=59), basic woodworker's book

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +12 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 92

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_longsword_ +13 ([versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d8+2 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_composite longbow_ +15 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 2d8+2 piercing

**[Hunt Prey](/Actions.aspx?ID=10)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) 

**[Hunted Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=492)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Flourish](/Traits.aspx?ID=73)) 

**[Hunter's Edge](HuntersEdge.aspx)**   

**Ancestry Feats**   [General Training](/Feats.aspx?ID=68) ([Toughness](/Feats.aspx?ID=855)), [Natural Ambition](/Feats.aspx?ID=70) ([Monster Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=493))

**Class Feats**   [Animal Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=311)([Ekundayo's Dog](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2392)), [Giant Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=3900), [Hunted Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=492), [Mature Animal Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=311), [Monster Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=493)

**General Feats**   [Incredible Initiative](/Feats.aspx?ID=794), [Toughness](/Feats.aspx?ID=855)

**Skill  Feats**   [Magical  Crafting](/Domains.aspx?ID=19),  [Specialty  Crafting](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1969) (woodworking), [Titan Wrestler](/Feats.aspx?ID=854), [Train Animal](/Feats.aspx?ID=856)

**Class Abilities**   Hunt Prey, Hunter's Edge ([precision](/HuntersEdge.aspx?ID=2)), Iron Will, Trackless Step, Weapon Expertise

</column>
name: Ekundayo (Level 6)
